sentences.en: A good teacher can encourage artistic creativity.
sentences.cn: 好的老师能够激励艺术创造力.

sentences.en: an admixture of aggression and creativity
sentences.cn: 进取精神和创意的结合

sentences.en: Becoming your own person releases your creativity.
sentences.cn: 保持自己的本色才有助于发挥自身创造力。
创造力是人类的一种特性。

sentences.en: Creativity is being strangled by financial pressures.
sentences.cn: 创造力被经济上的重重压力抑制住了.

sentences.en: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.cn: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

sentences.en: Her natural creativity and artistic talent make her home a real showstopper.
sentences.cn: 她天生的创造力和艺术天赋让她的家不同凡响，令人叹服。

sentences.en: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
sentences.cn: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

sentences.en: I regard creativity both as a gift and as a skill.
sentences.cn: 我认为创造力既是一种天赋也是一种技巧。
给孩子们定的各种规矩扼杀了他们的创造力。

sentences.en: She got an unusually low score for creativity.
sentences.cn: 在创造力方面,她得了异乎寻常的低分.

sentences.en: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.cn: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.en: The judges'creativity is not reserved to individuals only.
sentences.cn: 法官们的创造性并不只是局限个人.

sentences.en: There is limited scope for creativity in my job.
sentences.cn: 我的工作中发挥创造力的空间有限.

sentences.en: There may be a link between madness and creativity.
sentences.cn: 在疯狂和创造力之间也许有着某种联系。

sentences.en: We are mindful of the creativity, innovations, and vision of people.
sentences.cn: 我们不要忘记人的创造力, 革新和想象力.

sentences.en: You also must exercise your creativity and design judgment here.
sentences.cn: 在此阶段,你也必须锻炼你的创造力和设计判断能力.

words.tran_cn: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tran_cn: 创造性，创造力，创作能力
